title: Photographing Groups: Learn Plus Episode Intro
summary: Lindsay Adler introduces an episode of Learn Plus focused on the complexities of photographing groups, covering lighting, composition, and depth of field in both studio and location settings.

steps.action: Introduction to the episode topic: photographing groups and capturing families.
Explanation of technical considerations: depth of field, lighting, and composition for groups.
Overview of studio shooting using common modifiers and specialty tools.

key_takeaways: Group photography requires specific attention to depth of field to keep everyone in focus.
Lighting and composition need adjustment when moving from single subjects to groups.
The full episode covers workflows for both studio and outdoor location shoots.
